document.full_text: the mother of accused child killer casey anthony asked pointed questions about 2-year-old granddaughter caylee's fate in a video of a jailhouse visit played on thursday for jurors.
document.title: in jail visits, casey anthony's mother sought answers
lines_and_colors: the mother of accused child killer casey anthony asked pointed questions about 2-year-old granddaughter caylee's fate in a video of a jailhouse visit played on thursday for jurors.
